jollyRoger: A sawshark head with a sawtooth crown

keyMoments.title: Arlong Discovers Zoro's Intrusion
keyMoments.description: Arlong returns to find his base damaged and learns that Roronoa Zoro was responsible for the destruction and has escaped.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the conflict between the Arlong Pirates and the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Kuroobi Questions Nami's Loyalty
keyMoments.description: Kuroobi suspects Nami of helping Zoro escape, creating internal tension within the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Tests Nami's position within the crew and forces her to take drastic action to prove loyalty.

keyMoments.title: Nami Proves Loyalty by Appearing to Kill Usopp
keyMoments.description: Nami appears to kill the captured Usopp to demonstrate her allegiance to the Arlong Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: A pivotal moment showing the crew's ruthlessness and Nami's desperate situation.

base: Arlong Park, Cocoyasi Village, Conomi Islands, East Blue
goals: Establish Fish-Man dominance over East Blue
Create detailed maps of East Blue through Nami

trivia.fact: The Arlong Pirates were formed after Arlong split from the Sun Pirates and traveled to East Blue to establish his own empire.
Each officer of the Arlong Pirates represents a different type of fish-man with unique abilities.
